devdoc.author: David Lucid <david@rari.capital> (https://github.com/davidlucid)
devdoc.details: Implements the `PriceOracle` interface used by Ionic pools (and Compound v2).

constructor.details: Fetches the fair LP token/ETH price from Uniswap, with 18 decimals of precision.

params.cToken: The cToken to get the underlying price of

returns._0: The underlying asset price mantissa (scaled by 1e18).  Zero means the price is unavailable.

params.underlying: The underlying asset to get the price of.

returns._0: The underlying asset price in ETH as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18). Zero means the price is unavailable.

devdoc.title: UniswapLpTokenPriceOracle

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Get the underlying price of a cToken asset

price(address).notice: Get the price of an underlying asset.

userdoc.notice: UniswapLpTokenPriceOracle is a price oracle for Uniswap (and SushiSwap) LP tokens.
